mapper.sql: UID, USERNAME, PASS, EMAIL, MOBILE, STATUS, IS_ADMIN, DEPART_ID
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (UID, USERNAME, PASS, EMAIL, MOBILE, STATUS, IS_ADMIN, DEPART_ID) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tbl_user
UID,
USERNAME,
PASS,
EMAIL,
MOBILE,
STATUS,
IS_ADMIN,
DEPART_ID,

mapper.update:
update tbl_user
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASS = #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DEPART_ID = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_user set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS = #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DEPART_ID = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
